patthana20.2:1.1_0: Naappaccayaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca sappaccayo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana20.2:3.1_0: Naasaṅkhataṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca saṅkhato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana20.2:5.1_0: Nasanidassanaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca sanidassano dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana20.2:5.1_1: Nasanidassanaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca anidassano dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana20.2:5.1_2: Nasanidassanaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca sanidassano ca anidassano ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā.
patthana20.2:6.1_0: Nasanidassano dhammo sanidassanassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo … tīṇi.
patthana20.2:7.1_0: Nasanidassano dhammo anidassanassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo.
patthana20.2:7.1_1: Naanidassano dhammo anidassanassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo.
patthana20.2:8.1_0: Hetuyā tīṇi, ārammaṇe dve, adhipatiyā cattāri, anantare samanantare ekaṁ, sahajāte tīṇi, aññamaññe ekaṁ, nissaye tīṇi, upanissaye dve, purejāte pacchājāte tīṇi, āsevane ekaṁ, kamme tīṇi, vipāke …pe…
patthana20.2:8.1_1: magge tīṇi, sampayutte ekaṁ, vippayutte tīṇi …pe…
patthana20.2:9.1_0: Nasappaṭighaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca sappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana20.2:9.1_1: Nasappaṭighaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca appaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana20.2:9.1_2: Nasappaṭighaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca sappaṭigho ca appaṭigho ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā.
patthana20.2:10.1_0: Naappaṭighaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca appaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana20.2:10.1_1: Naappaṭighaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca sappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana20.2:10.1_2: Naappaṭighaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca sappaṭigho ca appaṭigho ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā.
patthana20.2:11.1_0: Nasappaṭighañca naappaṭighañca dhammaṁ paṭicca sappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana20.2:12.1_0: Hetuyā nava, ārammaṇe ekaṁ …pe… aññamaññe cha …pe… avigate nava.
patthana20.2:13.1_0: Narūpiṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca rūpī dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana20.2:14.1_0: Hetuyā nava, ārammaṇe tīṇi, adhipatiyā pañca …pe…
patthana20.2:15.1_0: Nalokiyaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca lokiyo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana20.2:15.1_1: Nalokiyaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca lokuttaro dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana20.2:15.1_2: Nalokiyaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca lokiyo ca lokuttaro ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā.
patthana20.2:16.1_0: Nalokuttaraṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca lokiyo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana20.2:17.1_0: Nalokiyañca nalokuttarañca dhammaṁ paṭicca lokiyo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (1.) (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana20.2:18.1_0: Hetuyā pañca, ārammaṇe dve …pe… avigate pañca.
patthana20.2:19.1_0: Nakenaci viññeyyaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca kenaci viññeyyo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
